column2:
"<%me>!
How are you finding the new Hero class? I really hope you like it!"
"So... I have a request for you! I want to see how you fight as a Hero!"
"Sword, Twin Machineguns, Talis! Those new Photon Arts! I want to see you use it all!"
"Ah! I'm sorry! I got a bit carried away there..."
"I'd be very grateful to have your cooperation in developing the Hero class."
